description:
Get your bike looking shiny and clean in no time with this 3-piece set. Crafted from durable Beech wood with a wax coating, they're built to last and feel good in your hands.

  • Bog Brush has 360° super-soft bristles for clatter-free cleaning
  • Detail Brush is ideal for tight gaps like suspension linkages
  • Drivetrain Brush gets into those tight spaces on your chain and cassette
name: Peaty's Bike Brush Set 4 Piece
